creator: felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com
text:
The native cform libraries are not included in page because they do not match
the namespace. The patch adds two files for temporary stripping and re-adding
the xhtml namespace. Further, the cforms libraries are made accessible with the
/cforms/** url (analog to the editors).

Commit de la revisión 312891.

Thx Felix!
creator: thorsten@apache.org
